> linked list for the objects looks to be the easiest way to handle 
them, just FYI.. though on some of those maps, there's like a billion 
objects! :/

Hehehe.  The scenario I have with gold basically everywhere and only 
16 faeries takes a while to load, even on this PC: one reason: there 
is gold practically everywhere.

About the 48 hours business, I meant if this area gets a dry spell, I 
will start 'The 50 Project'.

The first thing on I plan on doing with the file extraction and file 
encryption programs is use them to raise and lower character 
experience levels and maybe, if I'm brave enough, use it to add new 
characters to an existing scenario.

BTW, have you all found any problems with handling objects on top of 
another?  That is if I put an elf on top of an exit, your programs 
won't have problems, right?
